title: Smart Client Portal with AI-Powered Proposal Generation
impactLine: Automated proposal creation and client communication, significantly reducing manual effort while improving proposal consistency and turnaround time.
problem: Freelancers rely on fragmented tools like emails and documents to collect requirements, write proposals, and manage revisions, leading to inefficiencies, miscommunication, and inconsistent proposal quality.
constraints: Secure handling of client data and credentials
Low-friction client access without account creation

decisions.title: Adopted AI-Assisted Proposal Drafting
decisions.why: Using the Hugging Face Inference API with a large language model reduced repetitive writing while keeping freelancers in full editorial control.

decisions.title: Tokenised Email-Based Client Interaction
decisions.why: Secure response tokens enabled clients to accept or request revisions without creating accounts, reducing friction while maintaining security.

architecture.overview: A full-stack framework-based web application with server-side routing, AI integration, and secure email-driven workflows.
bullets: React Router v7 framework mode for integrated frontend and server logic
Node.js and TypeScript backend with server loaders and actions
Prisma ORM with SQLite for relational data persistence
Hugging Face Inference API for AI proposal generation
Resend API for automated email workflows

implementationNotes: Implemented secure session-based authentication using HttpOnly cookies and bcrypt password hashing.
Designed a proposal lifecycle with draft, sent, accepted, and revision states.
Integrated a rich-text editor for editing AI-generated proposals before sending.
Built validation and fallback logic to handle AI or email service failures.
results: Automated end-to-end proposal workflow from client intake to acceptance
Reduced manual proposal drafting effort while improving consistency
Secure, low-friction client participation via tokenised links
System validated through functional, security, and end-to-end testing
tradeoffs: Increased initial development complexity due to full-stack framework learning curve
AI-generated content still requires human review for accuracy and tone
nextImprovements: PDF proposal export and download support
Team-based roles for collaborative proposal management
